article.title: Information Systems Receives U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Information Systems Worldwide Corporation, Arlington, Virginia, was awarded a more than $23 million contract to conduct gap-filling research and enhance the existing software architecture to search information; rapidly acquire new contextual information; and deliver timely information across domains.Â This research will support and enhance the current analytic workflow and provide enhanced sharing of information. Air Force Research Laboratory, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity.
